tool_description: Store sensor data in managed/cloud database compatible to InfluxDB.  Tested to work with Grafana, Node-RED, and other platforms. Each plan provides data retention up to 10 years.  Use webhooks to trigger events in systems like n8n or other low-code environments.
name: timedb
title: timedb

api_list.name: results
api_list.description: Returns latest results for a query associated to a given `webhookId`.

api_list.name: webhooks
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of existing webhooks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://timedb.p.rapidapi.com/webhooks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "timedb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: measurements
api_list.description: Retrieve list of Measurements in TimeDB

api_list.name: provision
api_list.description:
**Runs provisioning on database(s) causing downsampling of data. Provides connection and retention information for account as a result**

Must be run after new measurements or fields are added to datasets (e.q. if new sensor is providing data or additional fields should be stored for existing sensor/measurement).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://timedb.p.rapidapi.com/manage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "timedb.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: query

optional_parameters.name: database
optional_parameters.description: A list of retention policy specific databases could be retrieved using the `manage` endpoint.
